summary: An ordinance relating to the municipal light and power system and providing for the acquisition by codemnation of certain property and property rights in Sections 2, 3, 10, 11, 14, 15, 23, 26 & 35, Township 40 North, Range 43 East, W.M., in Township 39 North, Range 43 East, W.M., and in Sections 4, 5, 7, 8, 17, 18, 19 & 20, Township 38 North, Range 43 East, W.M., as a site for the boundary hydroelectric development project as authorized by the Federal Power Commission under Project No. 2144 (Pend Oreille River), and for access to such project area; and providing for payment.
